actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from imposing certain safety standards and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Transportation from requiring any motor vehicle to be equipped with a starter interlock system or any device designed to indicate that seatbelts or upper torso restraints are not being utilized by drivers and passengers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from imposing certain safety standards and for other purposes.
